EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015 is TOMORROW! Your ticket and final information!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
Congratulations, you have secured one of the limited priority admission places at our Ignite event in 2015. Please click here to get your ticket and bring a printed copy with you to the event to gain exclusive access to a range of workshops, stalls and networking events!
What to Bring
A copy of your CV, cover letter and personal statement. We have a huge range of professionals attending who can give you 1-2-1 feedback and advice throughout the event!
A pen and paper - you will take part in a range of workshops and there will be a lot information that you will want to remember!
Do ensure that you come dressed professionally. You never know who you are going to meet during the day, and first impressions count!
A light lunch will be provided during the networking session (12:00 - 13:00), but to bring food and drink to keep you refreshed for the rest of the event!
If you do have any questions send an email to tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org or on the day call Promila on 07587 037614.
Competition Time!
Win an Ipad Mini!
We want to give every NCS graduate the opportunity to be involved in Ignite - but we need your help! We need you to get online, into your school, back in touch with your wave and telling everyone about why they should also come down to Ignite!
The person who gets the most NCS graduates to sign up and attend on the day will win an IPad Mini! Winner!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Rhiannon at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org.
